Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's an experience that promises to elevate your life to new heights. Given its unique value and quality, we are offering this masterpiece to you at an exclusive price of $850000. We believe this offer presents a fantastic opportunity for you to own something truly exceptional. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
